Class: Order

Order(orderId)

Class for initializing and constructing Order with chainable interface.

addLocation(type, location) → {Order}

Adds an associated location to the order. Up to 2 locations can be added.

setTime(type, time) → {Order}

Sets an associated time to the order.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
type string One of TransactionValues.TimeType.
time string Time to add. Time should be ISO 8601 representation of time value. Could be date, datetime, or duration.
